document.full_text: u.s. stocks fell late on friday as a spike in oil prices revived worries that inflation would derail the recovery, jolting a market that had been treading water ahead of corporate earnings.
document.title: market falls in late sell-off, volume light
lines_and_colors: u.s. stocks fell late on friday as a spike in oil prices revived worries that inflation would derail the recovery, jolting a market that had been treading water ahead of corporate earnings.
